Package islands

Class Route

java.lang.Object
islands.Route
public class Route
extends java.lang.Object
This class links two islands together. Routes have a distance, and an array of random events. The distance affects how long it will take a ship to get to a destination. When a route is traveled, there is a chance for various random events to happen. These are represented by the array of random events.
Author:
fma107

  • Constructor Details

    • Route

      public Route​(Island island1, Island island2, int distance, java.lang.String[] randomEventRisk)
      Parameters:
      island1 - One island this route connects
      island2 - Another island this route connects
      distance - How long the route is
      randomEventRisk - A 3-len array of random event risks for:
      {PirateAttack, Weather, Rescue} respectively.
      The risk can either be "none", "low", "medium", or "high"

  • Method Details

    • availableRoutes

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Route> availableRoutes​(Route[] allRoutes, Island currIsland)
      Filter function.
      Takes a list of routes & an island, returns given routes that contain the island.
      Parameters:
      allRoutes - List of all routes you want to check. Recommend just checking every route
      currIsland - Island that's getting checked for
      Returns:
      An array of every route that connects to/from the given island

    • getRisk

      public java.lang.String[] getRisk()

    • getIslands

      public Island[] getIslands()
      Every route connects 2 islands, this gets those islands
      Returns:
      2-length array of the islands this route connects

    • connectsIsland

      public boolean connectsIsland​(Island island)
      Since routes are two-way connection, checks if this connects the given island
      Parameters:
      island - Island we're checking
      Returns:
      true if this route connects to that island

    • getDistance

      public int getDistance()

    • getRandomEvents

      public RandomEvent[] getRandomEvents()
      Generates a list of random events given this route's risk
      Returns:
      the randomEvents

    • getOtherIsland

      public Island getOtherIsland​(Island thisIsland)
      Since routes are two-way, gets the other island this connects to. e.g. Routes connect Cheese <-> Bread, if your island is Bread, returns Cheese, and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      thisIsland - Your island
      Returns:
      The other island
